structure.unit: Chapter 17C METROPOLITAN DADE COUNTY DEMOLITION OF MOBILE HOMES AND REMOVAL OF DEBRIS FROM MOBILE HOME PARKS RENDERED UNINHABITABLE BY HURRICANE ANDREW AFTER ITS AFTERMATH

text.section:
Sec. 17C-6. Violation.
It shall be a violation of this chapter for any person to erect, establish, maintain, own, lease or allow to exist an uninhabitable mobile home park as defined in. Any such violation shall be redressed by Metropolitan Dade County or the United States Army Corps of Engineers or its designee (hereinafter referred to as "Army Corps") in the manner set forth in this chapter.
